thread.title: ShopShops Aims at Chinese Consumers Via Live Streaming

author: Cat Zakrzewski
title: ShopShops Aims at Chinese Consumers Via Live Streaming
text:
Some of the most prolific investors in U.S. retail startups are betting on ShopShops, a live streaming app aiming to sell U.S.-based brands to Chinese shoppers.
The startup, which has offices in New York and Beijing, has raised $6.1 million in seed funding. Forerunner Ventures led the companyâ€™s initial seed round, and the company subsequently raised a seed extension led by Union Square Ventures, with participation from investors including Founder Collective, SV Angel and GGV Capital.
